title: MyTherapy Pill Reminder
description: MyTherapy medicine reminder and medication tracker Our pill reminder app reliably reminds you to take your tablets, pills, and other medication, vitamins, or supplements at the scheduled time. With the medication tracker and pill counter, you always have a good overview of your treatment, your recorded intakes, and your stock. You can schedule reminders to record your weight, blood pressure, blood oxygen, blood sugar and other vital health metrics. You can track these metrics directly in the MyTherapy treatment tracker to see how your weight, blood pressure, etc. develop over time. Together with the pain diary and mood tracker, this forms a good basis for discussions with your doctor and pharmacist regarding any medical condition, ranging from migraines to ADHD. Download our pill reminder now! 💡 Easy to set up: Simply type in your medication or search our drug database to set your medicine reminder to any time or cycle you need and even set different times for the weekend. ⏰ Medication reminder: A reliable – perhaps even (positively) annoying – pill reminder for taking your medication, tablets, and pills on time. A practical med timer for anyone taking regular medications, with an insightful medication tracker accompanying the medicine reminders. 📉 Weight control and blood pressure: Reminder for 20+ measurements with the option of recording your weight or the measurement such as blood pressure and blood oxygen. Measurements are recorded in the health diary alongside the medication tracker. 🛒 New package: When you confirm your medicine reminder, the pill counter checks the current stock of tablets and gives you a prescription reminder to refill your pill pack. This way our medicine app helps you remember to order your next prescription in time by tracking your confirmed pill reminder intakes. 📝 Pain diary and mood tracker: Reminder for documenting symptoms to recognize patterns and check whether your medication is working properly. With the simple pain scale, you can differentiate between the frequency and intensity of your pain, e.g., for migraines or rheumatism. 📊 Monthly overview: By using our medicine tracker, you automatically maintain your personal treatment tracker. The documentation of tablet intake in the pill tracker and - if required - weight, blood pressure, and symptoms form the basis for discussions with the doctor and pharmacy and can easily be exported in PDF from the health diary. 💉 Injection site reminder: People who inject medicines should change their injection sites regularly. Relevant for many diabetes, multiple sclerosis, and obesity medications, among others. 👨‍⚕️ Appointments reminders for doctor’s visits: Our medication reminder app also helps you with the management of your doctor’s appointments. In addition to the medicine reminder functionality, you can easily set up a medical appointment reminder and prescription reminders. 📚 Proven effectiveness: Clinical studies with Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin prove the positive effect of the MyTherapy medicine tracker for people with diabetes and high blood pressure, among others. 🏆 First place in the German Health Award from news channel N-TV and the German Institute for Service Quality (09/2023) for our med timer. If you are looking for a multifunctional pill counter that delivers reliable medicine reminders, tracks important information in a treatment tracker, reminds you when its time to re-plenish your medication stock, and allows you to track your measurements like blood pressure or blood oxygen, look no further. Download the MyTherapy pill tracker today and begin using a reliable pill reminder and medicine tracker (also ideal for birth control reminders or as a pain medication tracker). Further information about the medication reminder, med timer and pill tracker of our medicine app at https://www.mytherapyapp.com/
descriptionHTML:
MyTherapy medicine reminder and medication tracker Our pill reminder app reliably reminds you to take your tablets, pills, and other medication, vitamins, or supplements at the scheduled time. With the medication tracker and pill counter, you always have a good overview of your treatment, your recorded intakes, and your stock.

You can schedule reminders to record your weight, blood pressure, blood oxygen, blood sugar and other vital health metrics. You can track these metrics directly in the MyTherapy treatment tracker to see how your weight, blood pressure, etc. develop over time. Together with the pain diary and mood tracker, this forms a good basis for discussions with your doctor and pharmacist regarding any medical condition, ranging from migraines to ADHD.

Download our pill reminder now!

💡 Easy to set up: Simply type in your medication or search our drug database to set your medicine reminder to any time or cycle you need and even set different times for the weekend.

⏰ Medication reminder: A reliable – perhaps even (positively) annoying – pill reminder for taking your medication, tablets, and pills on time. A practical med timer for anyone taking regular medications, with an insightful medication tracker accompanying the medicine reminders.

📉 Weight control and blood pressure: Reminder for 20+ measurements with the option of recording your weight or the measurement such as blood pressure and blood oxygen. Measurements are recorded in the health diary alongside the medication tracker.

🛒 New package: When you confirm your medicine reminder, the pill counter checks the current stock of tablets and gives you a prescription reminder to refill your pill pack. This way our medicine app helps you remember to order your next prescription in time by tracking your confirmed pill reminder intakes.

📝 Pain diary and mood tracker: Reminder for documenting symptoms to recognize patterns and check whether your medication is working properly. With the simple pain scale, you can differentiate between the frequency and intensity of your pain, e.g., for migraines or rheumatism.

📊 Monthly overview: By using our medicine tracker, you automatically maintain your personal treatment tracker. The documentation of tablet intake in the pill tracker and - if required - weight, blood pressure, and symptoms form the basis for discussions with the doctor and pharmacy and can easily be exported in PDF from the health diary.

💉 Injection site reminder: People who inject medicines should change their injection sites regularly. Relevant for many diabetes, multiple sclerosis, and obesity medications, among others.

👨‍⚕️ Appointments reminders for doctor’s visits: Our medication reminder app also helps you with the management of your doctor’s appointments. In addition to the medicine reminder functionality, you can easily set up a medical appointment reminder and prescription reminders.

📚 Proven effectiveness: Clinical studies with Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin prove the positive effect of the MyTherapy medicine tracker for people with diabetes and high blood pressure, among others.

🏆 First place in the German Health Award from news channel N-TV and the German Institute for Service Quality (09/2023) for our med timer.

If you are looking for a multifunctional pill counter that delivers reliable medicine reminders, tracks important information in a treatment tracker, reminds you when its time to re-plenish your medication stock, and allows you to track your measurements like blood pressure or blood oxygen, look no further.

Download the MyTherapy pill tracker today and begin using a reliable pill reminder and medicine tracker (also ideal for birth control reminders or as a pain medication tracker).

Further information about the medication reminder, med timer and pill tracker of our medicine app at https://www.mytherapyapp.com/
summary: Our medicine app helps with a medication reminder, medicine tracker & med timer.
